document.full_text: microsoft corp is looking to put its popular kinect motion-sensing device at the heart of its xbox game console, unveiling plans on monday to allow users to control live television feeds, search youtube and play action games with voice commands.
document.title: microsoft's kinect to control tv, youtube, more games
